## getBaseNameOfHumpFormat() function

convert the name of the package from a divider format to a hump format, and the scope prefix is automatically removed 把包的名字从分隔线格式转换成驼峰格式，并且会自动去除 scope 前缀

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getBaseNameOfHumpFormat(pkgName: string, initial?: boolean, separators?: string | string[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pkgName | string | name of the package 包的名字 |
|  initial | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> 是否大写首字母，默认：true |
|  separators | string \| string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> optional; default: \["-","\_"\] ; separator or separator good array \["-","\_"\]； 可选；默认值：\["-","\_"\] ；分隔符，或 包含多个分隔符的数组 |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

string return hump format string 返回驼峰格式的字符串
